first.description: I was the lead frontend developer on an innovative project for a hemoderivative company. I designed and built the interface that allowed for efficient management of refrigerator inventory. My focus was on creating an intuitive and user-friendly user experience.

responsibilities.one: Develop and maintain the front-end of the various system endpoints.
responsibilities.two: I closely collaborated with the team to integrate the system with a cloud-based database, enabling real-time access to crucial data from different devices.
responsibilities.three: I ensured that the interface was functional and accessible on different devices, including computers and mobile phones, for flexible management from any location.
